storyInfo:
Orchid struggles with her decision to transfer to the Logistics Department. Midnight shares a story about his past.
No matter your past, what matters it the present, and the life you now want.

attributes.content: 9:39 P.M. Inside the Rhodes Island Landship
Phew.... Finally finished.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Good work, Orchid.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: I've gotten to know you all so well. It's like I'm part of the team now, huh?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Ahaha. You've really gotten good at this, Orchid.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Ha... I'm better at this than looking after the circus, that's for sure.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Why don't you apply for a transfer to logistics then?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: You know, people like you who come out of the, uh, more normal world usually end up working in logistics. It's kind of unusual to become a combat operator.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: We've all been wondering why you decided to go to the front lines, actually.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: You wonder why, huh...?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: What kind of work would you like to do for Rhodes Island, Orchid?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: The assessments show you have an aptitude for Originium Arts. If you're interested, we could put you on the front lines.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: But since you are a civilian with no relevant combat experience, we still recommend that you join a logistics-related section.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Of course, rest assured that even if you go into a combat role, we won't put you in danger. No more than you can handle, anyway.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: What does logistics do?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Well... It's a pretty broad department with a lot of functions. But, in general, you can think of it as the jobs that keep Rhodes Island running.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Since there are more clerical jobs, it's well suited to people like you. Folks used to city life.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: (He means sitting in an office...?)
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: (I came here for a change. I don't want to spend my life in a cubicle.)
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I... I want to go into a combat role.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Are you sure? It can be tough being a front line operator.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator.

attributes.content: Yes. I want to give it a try.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Okay then.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: (I probably shouldn't tell him I wasn't interested in office work.)
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: ........Let's just say I sort of fell into it.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Ah, yeah. That'll happen if you don't know what you're getting yourself into.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Oh, oh yeah...?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: But I seem to remember we have a way to deal with these sorts of things. Let me take a look here....
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Ah, yep. Here we go.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: 'Combat operators of civilian origin who, within one year of working as a combat operator, find themselves unsuited to the role, may apply for reclassification as a logistics operator. It will be unconditionally approved.'
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: You haven't been here that long, so you should be good to go. Actually, everyone in A6 should be good. Except Spot, since he was a Sargon soldier.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: And even with Spot, I bet we can find a little wiggle room.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Oh yeah? I never thought about it before.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: It's not like our work is any easier than that of a combat operator. Rhodes Island depends on us to keep moving.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Yeah, right. Thanks. I'll think about it.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Orchid, are you done yet?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: I just finished.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Okay~
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Well, if it isn't little Popukar. Is she waiting for you?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Yes. I bumped into her on the way and she came along.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Now that you mention it, I think I remember you applied for a double room to share with her?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Yes. *Sigh* That girl is a handful. And who sends a child that small out to war anyway?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: But the rest of the team is either unreliable or even more trouble than she is. So here we are.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Orchid, are you done yet?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Coming. All right, I'd better go.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Don't forget what we talked about. I'll be waiting for your answer.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Ha.... Isn't it ironic? I became a combat operator to ditch the office. And now look at me.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Am I doomed to the rat race, no matter what path I take...?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Orchid, what's a rat race?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: It's a miserable life, sitting in an office for 8 hours a day, growing fat and sick, doing tedious, menial labor and sometimes putting in overtime.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Oh... don't get it.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Anyway, Popukar, how did you end up at Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Um, Dr. Kal'tsit and Dr. Ansel bought me.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: What? Bought?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Yeah. I used to work in a lumberyard.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: One day, Dr. Ansel and Dr. Kal'tsit were passing by there and saw me. They played with me all day.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: The next day, I don't know how or why, but Dr. Kal'tsit bought me.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: A lumberyard?!
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Yes. My mom and dad sent me to work in the lumberyard when I was very young. The boss was sometimes very mean to me. But at least he fed me...
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Did you ever see your parents again?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Oh, no.... The boss said my mom and dad went very far away and couldn't come to see me. So I just had to wait.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Then Dr. Ansel said that if I was good, Rhodes Island would help me find my mom and dad, and I might see them again someday!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Hey, Orchid, why are you hugging me all of a sudden? What's wrong?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: ...Nothing. Sometimes a girl needs hugs is all.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: How would you like to be like those boys and girls back there? Doing things in a chair, not needing to run around all the time?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Um, Dr. Ansel asked me the same question, but I don't really understand that kind of stuff. I just know I'm pretty strong.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: But I've been trying really hard to learn to read. Then I can help you, and all those boys and girls in the office!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: ...Of course.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Yeah...! Orchid, what happened? You look really sad. Did I say something bad?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Not at all. It's my fault. I shouldn't have asked about that.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: You're always so nice to me, Orchid. You can ask me anything.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Orchid, why are you hugging Popukar in the middle of the corridor? People might get the wrong idea.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: ...Ahem. Don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Hi, Catapult!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Oh, hi Popukar.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Are you guys going home?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Yes. Now why are you all sweaty? You better not be running off to get yourself, and by extension me, into trouble.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Come on, Orchid, give me a little credit. I just finished a session with Midnight.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: ......A what with Midnight?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Huh? Don't tell me you don't know. Unless there's a mission, Midnight works out in the training room every day about this time.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: I didn't have anything to do today, so he roped me in, worked my tail off, and finally let me go. Spot's there giving him the business now.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: How should I know? I figured you'd be up on it. I just know I need to steer clear of Midnight around ten o'clock.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: I knew about it! Midnight also got me to join. But then I hit him and he flew away and he didn't ask me again.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Bwahahahahaha! So that's the story. No wonder he dodged the question when I asked if he told you. Hahaha! My sides!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: ...All right. As long as you're not making trouble.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Why do you always come back to that?! This is discrimination, Orchid. You're always so nice to Popukar, even when she makes trouble!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: I'd be so nice to you if you'd also go and sweetly apologize every time you did something bad.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: That's beyond me. And if I have to apologize for stirring things up, then where's the fun in it?!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Just stay out of trouble to begin with!
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: You're lucky you're at Rhodes Island, anywhere else would have... Never mind. Forget it.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Come on, Orchid, just come out with it. Nowhere else can handle my personality. And I don't wanna change. Only Rhodes Island would want a freak like me!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: But everybody here is talkative and awesome and the work is good and it pays well. I love it here.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: *Sigh*. Great. As long as you're happy.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Anyway, hurry back and take a shower. A girl shouldn't be out walking around all sweaty.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Sure~
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Hey, Orchid, the dorms are the other way.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: I'm going to check out the training room.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Oh. Popukar, why don't you come to my room tonight? I'll tell you a story.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Okay~
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Training Room
Did you skip dinner, Midnight? Kinda weak.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: My swordsmanship is about agility and cunning.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Keep talking. Music to my ears.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Ah hah!
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Slow. But not bad. I can tell you did eat enough after all.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Wow, Midnight and Spot are fighting.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Can I...?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Let's wait for them to finish.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Oh
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Pfft. *Pant*... water, please.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Here.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: ........Phew. Thanks.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Your military lineage shows, Spot. You're usually so lethargic, but you're clearly much better than me at this.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: You've got something to be proud of. If you didn't have the basics, I'd have my comics in one hand while I fought you with the other.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Am I so weak?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: How can I get my point across without hurting your feelings?
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: No need.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: But I'm actually curious, you were an escort before, right?
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: You've got the fundamentals. I can tell. A couple years of practice.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: That's not up to military standard. But for a civilian, you can fight.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Can I take that as a compliment?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I'm mostly trying to convince myself that the most useless guy on our team actually has something to offer.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Haha... Actually...
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Midnight! Spot!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Orchid's here. You're boned.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Why's that?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I don't know, but she looks like my mom did whenever things were about to get real bad for me.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Oh, you're wrong about that. And it's my turn to teach you some tricks for dealing with women.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: *Snort*.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Good evening, Miss Popukar, Miss Orchid.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: As you can see, I'm doing my daily exercise.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: And why don't I know about this routine?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I never thought you'd be interested, Miss Orchid. And it's all on my own time.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: ...Fair enough.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: But we're normal people. And Instructor Dobermann made it clear that civilian teams like us won't ever end up on dangerous missions. So what's the point?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Oh, good question. Mm, a truly fantastic question, Orchid.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Let's take a break for now, shall we, Spot?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Yeah, whatever. I'm just here to help out. I'll go get a comic book to read.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Orchid, do you know what the secret to success is in my line of work?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: That's a rhetorical question, to start things off. I can continue without an answer.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I'd guess the trick is to be handsome, first and foremost. And then be a decent talker?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: No, no, and no. Although I consider myself quite beautiful, and I do know how to pay a compliment...
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Bleh.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: What's wrong with Spot?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Nothing, just looking at a clown in a whole new light.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Heh heh. Confidence is very important. But by far the most important is to treat all your clients equally.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: That isWhen you step into my realm, my presence, then, whoever you are, the only thing you are, is my client.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: ........What's the point of all this? Are you trying to say that everyone's the same to you?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Not at all, my dear sweet captain. Clever as you are, you've never thought this through.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: It's not that everyone's the same to me. It's that, simply, everyone's the same.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: The iron-fisted career woman, tyrant of her office section, could actually just be wearing a mask for the sake of her work. If she wears it long enough, she may forget how to take it back off.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: The outwardly homely housewife, whose husband likely cheated on her long ago, she stays at home telling no one of her troubles, with no choice but to come to drink with me.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: An ill-tempered fashion designer with her strong woman facade may just fear the gossip of others, and the resulting loss of trust.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Do you have a death wish?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Ha ha, did you think I was talking about you? People like this abound.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Everyone in the city, after unloading their identities and responsibilities, is exactly the same. Each and every one.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: So why, at Rhodes Island, would things be any different?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Do the elite operators who go diving headlong into a warzone, come back and unplug themselves like so much machinery?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: No, they drink and chat in the bar. They care for their freshly potted plants in the greenhouse. They listen to music, they read.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: They complain when a mission is too hard, or chuckle at how hilariously easy it was. They cry, they laugh, they mope, they hurt, and they die.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: They're no different from us, are they?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: ...You're a boy who knows how to give a speech.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Thank you for the compliment.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: ...*Sigh*. That all makes sense. But I still feel like it's not completely true.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: And I can't blame you for that. My industry, as it is, always had a bit of an underbelly to it. I have that advantage.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: But not you, Orchid. You grew up entirely in the light of day.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: The greatest hardships for you were lower pay than you'd like, insufficiently clear skin, traffic on your commute. Those sorts of things.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: This world of violence and bloodshed is indeed a brave new world for you.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: But you're here. You made your choice. Shouldn't you at least try to understand it instead of shackling yourself to the common sense of your past?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: The common sense of my past...
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I'm not trying to be preachy. I'm definitely not qualified to preach. But wouldn't the 'fashion guru' of Rhodes Island understand that?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Even you know about that, huh?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I've talked to quite a few senior operators. I've heard a lot of interesting stories.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: And you're getting in good with them?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I get in good with anyone, as long as they understand my language. This is my special power as the Devil of the Eastern Night.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: So you know perfectly well that the people who ask you to design their outfits and give fashion tips are ordinary people like us, don't you?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: By the way, Spot. You asked me why I knew how to fight when I was just an 'escort.'
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Huh? Ah, oh yeah, I forgot.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: You wound me. This is a bit of a story, so let's take it to the cafeteria. My treat.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Sounds like a pain in the ass. Can I pass? I don't really care.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Heh heh. I'm afraid not.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Damn. I blew it. I should've slipped out halfway through.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: I said it was my treat, but you could still show a little decorum...
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Do we have to?
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Mmmmm..... It's so good! Why aren't you eating, Orchid?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: I never eat after dinner.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: That's the mark of a modern woman.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Ahem, right, back to business then.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: First of all, if I may be so bold as to ask, Orchid, how did you contract Oripathy? If that's too personal a question, you don't have to answer.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: ........It's not a great story. Just one day I suddenly noticed a little crystalline growth on my body.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: The doctors said I must have been exposed to some Originium without even knowing. I still don't know exactly how I got it.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: That's it.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Ah, I see. No wonder you're having this little crisis.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: So, let me tell you my experience.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: There was a younger man working in my club.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: He was my polar opposite: bright, sunny disposition, straightforward. Instantly likeable.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Of course, no one who works in my industry could be called naive. But if I'm the type to make malicious assumptions about people, he's the type to trust them.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Sounds like the type I would hate.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Is that your way of saying you like me, Spot?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Orchid, is there really no cure for narcissism?
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: I'll ask Medical later. Maybe there's hope.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Heh heh. As I said before, I treat all my clients equally. Meaning I don't change my approach based on one's status or identity.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I make an active effort towards that goal. But for him, it was second nature.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: From my position atop the industry, I could see that he would be the one to surpass me.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: So that person surpassed Midnight?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: ........It can't be that simple.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: ........Yeah, it would be nice if that was the whole story.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Now that I think about it, I actually did him a disservice. He didn't come from a good family. He needed the money. To him, I must've looked like the king of the world.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: If I was out of his way, he would have been able to make it in that world.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I should have taught him much earlier how to situate himself, how to handle money, and how to be what people needed him to be.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Had I done that, maybe we wouldn't have ended up at each other's throats.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: He was jealous of you? And you didn't notice?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: ........He hid it well. Or rather, he didn't even notice it himself.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: It wasn't until he almost killed me the first time that I realized this flaw in my understanding of human nature.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I think it's got nothing to do with human nature. You're just too nice.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Right? I never thought of you as the type to mentor a newbie.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: But Midnight is a really good man! I always knew!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Thank you, Popukar.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: But you said 'first time,' which means there was a second time.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: He did almost kill me the first time. Almost. I'm confident, had that been his second attempt to kill a man, I wouldn't be sitting here.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: But I am.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I bet five Lungmen dollars you bitched out.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: No. I didn't. It's just... I couldn't have expected what happened next.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: At the time, I saw the world as Orchid does. I never thought of it as a place of malice and bloodshed.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I muscled him out of the industry and learned how to handle a sword. I thought that would be enough. I really did.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Until one day, I discovered a health problem.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Your Oripathy....
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: He paid my agent to infect me somehow.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: The second time he came looking for me, he was Infected himself. And he brought his 'friends' with him.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I had seen a lot of hate in my work. I thought I understood it. But when it was actually directed at me, I felt it burning in a way I hadn't ever before imagined.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: But you won.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: I did. Even if I can't go toe to toe with you, I can fight off a dozen thugs and walk away with my life.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: It was then, with my own hands, I took his...
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Waaaaaaahhhhhh!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: What's wrong, Popukar?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Poor Midniiiiiiight! Waaaaahhh...
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Don't cry, Popukar.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Honestly, I should thank him for showing me how immature I was.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: After that, I learned about a place called Rhodes Island and made up my mind to leave the industry and come all the way here after registering with the office in Higashi.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Along the way, I saw a lot, and thought a lot more. I came to Rhodes Island with a deep understanding of this one thing.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: What are you looking at?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Let me share my thoughts with you, Orchid.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I'm not trying to say that because we've seen the cruel reality of the world here, we need to accept it.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: From our point of view, it's only natural to think that most of Rhodes Island's operators have been through unnecessary pain.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: We shouldn't feel inferior for having grown up in our relative safety, but it isn't an excuse for us to fight it either.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Life is the same everywhere.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Where we used to live, the only way to get what we wanted was to work hard and earn money. It's actually the same here.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: We could have chosen to join the logistics department and put in the same effort there. But I chose the path of war.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: ........Aren't you afraid to die?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I think we're all afraid to die.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: But as you've learned in your time here, Orchid, sooner or later you have to fight to defend something.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: This would be a fine time to say 'I'm training hard so I can be strong to defend you, Orchid,' but I'd like you to think about something instead
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: What kind of life do you want to lead at Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: ........I understand.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Um... but I don't...
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Good. This is something you'll never have to worry about. Why not eat up instead? Here, you can have mine.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Wow, thanks Spot!
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Hehe. He's right. You don't have to worry about this stuff, Popukar.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: And forgive me for dumping all this on you, Orchid, but the question you asked me is one I've been asking myself a lot since I came to Rhodes Island. So I had a lot to say about it.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: .......Well, thanks for that.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Oh, wonder of wonders, miracle of miracles! The blessed savior Orchid has finally shown me gratitude! Brother Spot, Sister Popukar, such luck you have brought me!
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: You're a dead man. Popukar, we need to get to bed. We have a big day tomorrow.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Oh, we're done?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: We're done.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Okay.... Good night, Spot. Good night, Midnight.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Good night.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Sweet dreams to the two beautiful ladies.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: So you're not worried we'll turn out like the guy from your club?
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Heh heh. Not to toot my own horn, but I have a lot more confidence as a judge of character these days.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: *Snort*.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Besides, we're on the same team. It's good to get to know each other better, no?
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Sure. But I never imagined you'd be hung up on all that garbage.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: Now that I've thought it through, I don't need to trouble myself anymore.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: I guess so. Say, did you use any of those tricks for dealing with women just now?
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: I did indeed. The most important trick of alltelling the truth.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Sounds pretty easy to me.
attributes.name: Spot

attributes.content: It's important because it's simple.
attributes.name: Midnight

attributes.content: Orchid, when we get back, can Catapult tell me a story?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Not tonight. Midnight kept us out too late.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Okay. I'm just glad to see you happy, Orchid.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Oh? Have I been unhappy lately?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Um, I don't know how to say this. But you seemed very upset after we left the logistics department. Not now though. Now you look happy.
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Did I...? I guess I did.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Thank you, Popukar.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Did I do something?
attributes.name: Popukar

attributes.content: Hehe. You just don't know it yet.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Excuse me, are you Orchid?
Oh? You are...?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I'm Sora, with Penguin Logistics. I've heard you're kind of an expert on fashion, and pretty handy with a needle and thread. Can I talk to you for a minute?
attributes.name: Sora

attributes.content: 6:23 P.M. Inside the Rhodes Island Landship
So you decided to carry on as a combat operator. That's too bad. But it's your call, Orchid. We'll respect it.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator A

attributes.content: Yes. It may not be a good fit for me, but it's a special opportunity. I don't want to waste it.
attributes.name: Orchid.

attributes.content: That's true. Sitting in the office all day is pretty boring.... Maybe I should apply for a transfer and try it out.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator A

attributes.content: You're dreaming. You wouldn't last two seconds with Dobermann.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator B.

attributes.content: Oh yeah, I've heard about that one. It's pretty cool you made it through her training, Orchid.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator A

attributes.content: You get used to it... Anyway, that's all for today.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Heading back so early?
attributes.name: Logistics Operator A

attributes.content: Yeah, I have a thing.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Okay, see you tomorrow.
attributes.name: Logistics Operator A.

attributes.content: See you tomorrow.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Oof... All these aches. That's what I get for skipping the gym that long.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I can't even move my hand to fill out a form.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Ugh, why did I do this to myself?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Orchid!!!! There you are. I've been looking for you!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: ........What's the matter? What did Popukar break this time?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Nothing. It's Midnight, he's sparring with Popukar. You've gotta see this!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: ...Okay. I'm totally out of it today anyway.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: What made you want to sign up for fitness training? It's not like you.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Call it a change of heart.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Oh. Want me to give you a shoulder rub?
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Okay, out with it, what did you do this time?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Woah, hey, I didn't do anything!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: I'll believe you, for once.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: You seem kinda different lately.
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Do I?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: I can't quite put my finger on it... But yeah...
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Come on, weren't we going to see Midnight eat shit?
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Hell yeah we were!
attributes.name: Catapult

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Orchid

attributes.content: Go looking for trouble and you just might find it.
attributes.name: Orchid
